item.description:
We will be using craft foam to create our scenes to print. Please bring images or ideas of what you think you'd like to create to use as inspiration for your printing. You could describe this technique as a 'poor mans block printing'. I found it fun and much more forgiving than carving linoleum. All materials will be provided for you. If you have favorite acrylic paint colors or stamp pads you could bring those but there will also be plenty available to share.


Here are some links to examples for inspiration:

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_HKIuJb7y_g/TWjbQ-haYdI/AAAAAAAAErA/hHgN6ywFvJA/s1600/longing%2Bfor%2Bspring%2Bart%2Blesson2%2B%2528Medium%2529.jpg

http://www.hossfineart.com/images/images_cropped_jpg/madronawoods.jpg

 

I will post some of my own pictures soon since none of the above are quite what I have in mind.

 


WHAT TO BRING: A basic art supply kit (scissors, glue stick, ruler) if you want to, otherwise we do have loaner materials at the studio. You may want to wear an apron or old clothes. Everything else will be supplied.

DAY/TIME: Saturday, May 5, from 2-4p.m.

AMENITIES: Free parking. Table space and a chair. Access to some tools (paper cutter, heat gun, some aprons, etc.). Access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom.

COST: $15; includes all supplies.

WHO MAY ATTEND: Anyone, but you must sign up on the NE ATC+ Meetup site (which requires joining that group; it's free with no obligation).

HOW TO SIGN UP: These smaller sessions are often full with a waiting list. Reserve a place by RSVP-ing "yes" using Meetup's RSVP function. Please RSVP for your guests as well.

If your plans (or your guests' plans) change, PLEASE update your RSVP accordingly. Please do this right up to the start time of the event.

CANCELLATIONS: In the unlikely event that we need to cancel---or even if we're just getting a late start--we'll post a message on the Web site and e-mail everyone who's RSVP'd "yes." So to be on the safe side, please check the Web site and your inbox before departing for ArtStudio 360.

Questions? E-mail Jen H. through the Meetup message board.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: ArtStudio360 Workshop: Faux-Screenprinting
